description: Input on a topic, non-durable, with optional selector

properties.name: topicname
properties.label: Topic Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the topic to create a subscriber on. Topic names follow SwiftMQ conventions such as MQTT.%, see docs

properties.name: selector
properties.label: Selector
properties.description: Provide an optional JMS message selector (SQL where condition, reference the properties in the message).
